query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS webhook_escalation_rules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  source_webhook_id INT NOT NULL,
  trigger_after_failures INT DEFAULT 3,
  trigger_after_minutes INT DEFAULT 15,
  level1_targets JSON,
  level1_delay_minutes INT DEFAULT 0,
  level2_targets JSON,
  level2_delay_minutes INT DEFAULT 15,
  level3_targets JSON,
  level3_delay_minutes INT DEFAULT 30,
  auto_resolve_on_success TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  notify_on_escalate TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  notify_on_resolve TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  is_active TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS webhook_escalation_rules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  source_webhook_id INT NOT NULL,
  trigger_after_failures INT DEFAULT 3,
  trigger_after_minutes INT DEFAULT 15,
  level1_targets JSON,
  level1_delay_minutes INT DEFAULT 0,
  level2_targets JSON,
  level2_delay_minutes INT DEFAULT 15,
  level3_targets JSON,
  level3_delay_minutes INT DEFAULT 30,
  auto_resolve_on_success TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  notify_on_escalate TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  notify_on_resolve TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  is_active TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
